snippet: Paramount Pictures became the first major Hollywood studio to stop delivering movies on 35-millimeter film in the United States, offering them only in digital format, The Los Angeles Times reported.
abstract: Paramount pictures becomes first major Hollywood studio to stop delivering films to theaters in United States on 35-millimeter film, reflecting industry's shift toward use of digital projection.
lead_paragraph: Paramount Pictures became the first major Hollywood studio to stop delivering movies on 35-millimeter film in the United States, offering them only in digital format, The Los Angeles Times reported.

headline.print_headline: Paramount Takes Step With Digital Film
headline.main: Paramount Takes Step With Digital Film
